Name: Asian Riddles
About the game: Solve the riddles of the far away land And Asian generosity will know no bounds! 108 unique levels 9 magnificent locations. More than 4 hours of gameplay in the most beautiful parts of Asia. Great music, spectacular trophies and a truly oriental atmosphere - this game will charm you!
